comments.body: Obviously a pre-existing problem, but we should probably try to avoid brittle expectations like this.

Yeah, my other option would be to accept `any` String as reason, but I felt that the reason is connected with the actual call, so I think the assertion can be a bit specific here. I hope the reason won't change often. If and when it changes we'll have to change this test case too.
If the reason is important, maybe we should put an enum type behind it or something. Anyway, not a major issue.
this seems to refer to `member.wakeup`. Best to follow that method.
This call is missing an `expectLastCall`. Here an in a couple other places.
